name: Live Cycling Manager
description:
The definitive cycling manager!

Create your club and totally manage it: sign up for races, cyclists, strategies, training, transfers, and much more! Become the Athletic Manager of a professional cycling team and lead it to victory.
Create a new club and personalise it however you want. Hire the best cyclists, trainers, psychologists, doctors, mechanics... Control your finances and manage the club of your dreams. Overcome all adversities that come your way throughout the season.

Prepare for the big tours with exclusive training sessions, pre-race concentrations, courses for employees, athletic material, and much more.
Immerse yourself in the experience of participating in online races in real time, give orders to your cyclists and view results in 3D. Compete entire seasons with another 18 sport managers, and go up a level at the end of the season.
